column4: when I do a .configure i get: checking for SSL directory... Not found...  what package am i missing?
Not sure, but you could file up Synaptic and search for ssl; you will find some possbilities.  You will need the *-dev pacakge(s).
what is the correct syntax to specify some dir for .configure.... ./configure --with-ssl /etc/ssl/ does not work.. do i use ""
You probably need to install the *-dev version of an ssl library.
